name: AIR FRYER SIM
description:
Have you ever wanted to own a restaurant where you only use air fryers? How well can you manage 10 air fryers at once?  Drag food from the boxes (on the right) into the air fryers. After half the cook time is done, shake the baskets by clicking the air fryers, and let them cook for the other half. Once finished, click again to serve. Can you keep up with the orders? Will you waste food? How many people can you serve?

Mouse controls only (you can delete highscore data by pressing P while Q and B are pressed)

DEVLOG:


BUG: I wrote that you instantly lose at 50 unfulfilled orders, but it's actually 25.

All assets are made for this game by Divagated (except for the font, which was made by Divagated, but not for this game)

Made for Jamulator 2021

https://itch.io/jam/jamulator-2021
